channel.title: Adding new items to items.cfg
channel.description: When I try adding new items it works, and every thing compiles fine, but the problem is, I log in and do not see the bonuses for the weapons I have added? Is there another file I have to edit, whats going on?

item.title: Adding new items to items.cfg
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

item.cfg go to the item and you see the 0’s change it to your bonus*

Read full topic

item.title: Adding new items to items.cfg
item.dc:creator: @mod_p mod p
item.description:
@mod_p wrote:

omg, darklord1.
change the last bonus of the item
first you have something like this:
item = 747 Glowing_dagger (text) 1000000 10000000 10000000 30 40 30 20 50 10 40 10 10 10 60 5

just change it to something like this

item = 747 Glowing_dagger (text) 1000000 10000000 10000000 9999 9999 9999 9999 9999 9999 9999 9999 9999 9999 9999 9999
it’s really that easy…
i used glowing dagger cause many base servers use it. you can also use something like “perfect ring” many ppls also use that one.

Read full topic
